body_html: Have you thought about just using DNS for the hostname instead of an IP? You can ensure that new hosts are mapped to the same failed hostname without needing to change anything in the TensorFlow codebase. If you're worried about port numbers, you might consider using DNS srv records and writing a custom ClusterResolver.

body: Have you thought about just using DNS for the hostname instead of an IP? You can ensure that new hosts are mapped to the same failed hostname without needing to change anything in the TensorFlow codebase. If you're worried about port numbers, you might consider using DNS srv records and writing a custom ClusterResolver.
